name: Yoga
description: Start with basic poses like downward dog and child's pose. Focus on slow breathing and controlled stretching movements.
purpose: Improves flexibility and mental calmness.

name: Running
description: Run at a steady pace, maintaining good posture and breathing rhythm. Alternate between jogging and sprinting for variation.
purpose: Enhances cardiovascular health and burns calories.

name: Cycling
description: Use a bike indoors or outdoors, maintaining a steady speed. Focus on pushing through the thighs and glutes.
purpose: Builds leg strength and boosts stamina.

name: Skipping
description: Jump rope with controlled wrist movements. Keep jumps light and consistent to avoid joint strain.
purpose: Burns calories quickly and improves agility.

name: Arm Building
description: Perform push-ups, bicep curls, and tricep dips using body weight or dumbbells.
purpose: Strengthens arm muscles and tones upper body.

name: Abs Workout
description: Include crunches, planks, and leg raises. Maintain proper form to engage the core effectively.
purpose: Builds a stronger core and tones abdominal muscles.

name: Shoulder Building
description: Perform shoulder presses, lateral raises, and push-ups for targeted muscle activation.
purpose: Improves shoulder strength and posture.

name: Leg Workout
description: Do squats, lunges, and calf raises. Use bodyweight or add resistance for more intensity.
purpose: Strengthens lower body muscles and boosts mobility.

name: Swimming
description: Swim laps using freestyle, backstroke, or breaststroke. Maintain steady breathing and smooth strokes.
purpose: Full-body workout that improves endurance and lung capacity.

name: Pilates
description: Focus on controlled movements, balance, and breathing techniques using mats or reformers.
purpose: Strengthens core and improves posture.

name: HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training)
description: Alternate short bursts of intense exercises like sprints and burpees with brief rest periods.
purpose: Burns calories fast and boosts metabolism.

name: Push-Ups
description: Lower and raise your body using your arms while keeping a straight posture.
purpose: Builds chest, arms, and core strength.

name: Pull-Ups
description: Hang on a bar and pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
purpose: Strengthens back and biceps.

name: Plank
description: Hold a push-up position with your body straight, resting on forearms and toes.
purpose: Builds endurance in abs, back, and shoulders.

name: Squats
description: Lower your body by bending knees and hips, then rise back up.
purpose: Strengthens legs and core muscles.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then return.
purpose: Strengthens legs, glutes, and balance.

name: Burpees
description: Start standing, drop into a push-up, jump up explosively, and repeat.
purpose: Full-body exercise that boosts strength and stamina.

name: Weightlifting
description: Lift weights with proper technique, focusing on compound lifts like bench press and deadlifts.
purpose: Builds muscle mass and strength.

name: Stretching
description: Perform static and dynamic stretches for major muscle groups.
purpose: Improves flexibility and reduces injury risk.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in push-up position and quickly alternate bringing knees to chest.
purpose: Increases core strength and burns calories.
